definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)

sentences.english: Single set of pressing platens with both heating and cooling on the same platens .
sentences.chinese: 单套压台上同时带有加热和冷却系统的压台配置。

sentences.english: I looked at a duplex as well as some traditional houses.
sentences.chinese: 我看了一些传统的单套的房子，还有双间一套的。

definition: song cycle in Chinese opera/(fig.) a series of tricks/polite remarks/number of (things that are counted in 套[tao4], like houses)
hardcover (book)/elaborately packaged/opposite: 簡裝|简装[jian3 zhuang1]
forward delivery apartment/unfinished housing to be paid for in advance by the buyer and then completed within certain time frame
square (as in square foot, square mile, square root)
